General.Name: Tunghsu Optoelectronic Technology Co
General.Description: Tunghsu Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing of optoelectronic displays and new energy vehicles in China. It offers liquid crystal glass substrates, cover glasses, color filters, and sapphire glasses; high-end equipment manufacturing and system integration services; energy buses; and graphene-based lithium-ion batteries, graphene LED lights, and graphene electric heating films. The company is also involved in the research and development, designing, and manufacturing of high-end intelligent equipment, and automated production line products for customers in the LCD and OLED panel industries. Tunghsu Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shijiazhuang Baoshi Electronic Glass Co., Ltd. Tunghsu Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Beijing, China.
